basic.description: This course is a workshop-style class for upper-class Music Theatre majors, where all the various components of their preceding class work can be integrated. The focus is on Advanced Acting for Music Theatre and Audition Techniques.
basic.subject: MUO
basic.title: Music Theatre Workshop

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: TPP 2110, TPP 2111, MVV 1312, and MVV 2322.
